Description:
Create accurate 2D and 3D drawings based on architectural and civil engineering designs and specifications.
Prepare detailed architectural drawings including floor plans, elevations, sections, and details.
Collaborate with architects, engineers, and project managers to understand project requirements and ensure drawings align with project objectives.
Use computer-aided design (CAD) software to create and modify drawings, ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices.
Incorporate revisions and changes into existing drawings as required.
Assist in the development and maintenance of drawing standards and templates.
Review drawings for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project requirements.
Coordinate with other team members to ensure drawings are delivered on time and meet project deadlines.
Stay updated with industry trends and advancements in architectural and civil engineering drafting techniques and software.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Architectural or Civil Engineering from a well-known university.
Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Draftsman in architectural or civil engineering projects.
Proficient in creating 2D and 3D drawings using CAD software (e.g., AutoCAD, Revit).
Strong knowledge of architectural and civil engineering principles, standards, and practices.
Experience in creating architectural drawings (floor plans, elevations, sections) and civil engineering drawings.
Familiarity with operation and maintenance projects is preferred.
Excellent proficiency in both English and Arabic languages, both verbal and written.
Attention to detail and a high level of accuracy in producing technical drawings.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Good time management skills and ability to prioritize tasks.
Ability to work effectively in a team environment and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
